reviews.name: The Pacific (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: The show is as good as the Band of Brothers, and really could only be watch High Def to get the full affect. I compared prices before my purchase and Walmart ONLINE and Amazon have it for the same price, everywhere else sells it for $75.
reviews.title: Awesome Set!

reviews.name: The Pacific (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: If you liked Band of Brothers then you will love the Pacific. Blu-Ray makes it even better.
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.name: The Pacific (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Great series. I couldn't stop watching. Worth every penny.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.name: The Pacific (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Personal stories on the men who fought was really good. Battles were depicted well. Couples relationships showed way too much. We could have understood without all the flesh display. But I would still recommend this series.
reviews.title: good veiw on effects of war

reviews.name: The Pacific (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This was given to my husband as a gift, since he was so fond of "Band of Brothers". Since this was a Spielberg/Tom Hanks production, he expected the same quality and was deeply disappointed. The story was supposed to be a documentary, but it turned out to be more of a soap opera--very shallow in comparison to BoB, with superficial plot lines. Each disc was only about 40 minutes long, which was a distinct surprise. We felt that the respect for the Marines' efforts and sacrifice in "Pacific" was clouded by the "boy-girl" relationship stories. Sorry- just not what we expected!
reviews.title: Surprising disappointment
